name: shell-bell
effect: Held: Heals the holder by 1/8 of any damage it inflicts.
short_effect: Held: Holder receives 1/8 of the damage it deals when attacking.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A hold item that
restores HP upon
striking the foe.

flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holding POKéMON regains some
HP upon striking the foe.
